name: toast2
description: A toast tool written in JavaScript and CSS with very little 3rd party dependencies.

scripts.deploy-master: git checkout master && git add --all && git commit -m 'source files update' && git push github master
scripts.deploy-pages: git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && git push github gh-pages -f && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy-master && npm run deploy-pages

author: zilong-thu
